If you are not mafia you are an ordinary person. You are not a good person (as all others). You are a fraud. And that's that.

turns.answer: I was talking to myself. I told you I was going to go to work. I told you I was going to play Mafia. It was the best job I'd ever had. And it was the perfect time to play. And so
